Package com.storytron.swat Description

Provides the implementation of Swat. Swat is the root of a set of editors that are integrated into a single java application.

Each editor is designed to handle a different part of the world model. The current editors are:

  • VerbEditor For editing verbs.
  • ActorEditor For editing actors.
  • RelationshipEditor For editing relations between actors.
  • PropEditor For editing props.
  • StageEditor For editing stages.

Each of this editors has its own class that defines and contains all the controls that appear in the editor. The editors are shown one at a time and are chosen from a menu.

Lizards

Swat also provides some auxiliary utilities for the user that are called lizards. Current lizards:
  • lizard for searching scripts containing certain node comments.
  • LogLizard for analyzing execution of a story.
  • Storyteller for playing a story.
  • Rehearsal for making rehearsals on the world.
  • SearchLizard for searching scripts.
  • Swat.ComesFromLizard for navigating backwards the verb web.
